snippet.title: Sony Vaio No More - PC Business Goes
snippet.description: For anyone who lived in the Windows world back around the turn of the millennium there was really only one option that came remotely close to the design of Apple laptops. Sony's Vaio PC brand was always a few years ahead of the competition - leveraging the best design smarts [...] read »

snippet.title: Sony Takes Fight To Apple On Battery Front With Intel's Haswell
snippet.description: A new line of Haswell processors from Intel has raised the bar for power consumption and battery life. The pressure is now on Apple to raise its game at WWDC.

snippet.title: Sony Burned By Laptop Problems
snippet.description: Shares in the electronic-goods maker drop as it recalls thousands of VAIOs. read »

snippet.title: Sony's Blues Caused By Blu-ray
snippet.description: Image via CrunchBase In the world of consumer electronics, Sony was once, the name on the must have products. Not every idea was a winner… who remembers the 1980’s bitter battle between Sony’s Betamax and JVC’s VHS video systems. Betamax was the better quality system, but the longest tape ran for [...] read »

snippet.title: How Sony Helped LL Cool J Become A Tech Entrepreneur
snippet.description: The rapper's latest venture is a company called Boomdizzle--whose flagship product, My Connect Studio, allows artists and producers to digitally record, edit and produce music in real time, even if they’re oceans apart. Think of it as Google Docs, but for music. read »
